string-array.name: checked_items_behavior
string-array.item: Move to the end of the list
Move to the end of unchecked items

resources.string: Remove password\nand unlock all locked notes?
Backup already exist. It\'ll be overwritten
No internet connection to fetch the changelog
Something went wrong in Omni Notes\nSend automatic report to developer?
Something went wrong in Omni Notes\nA report has been sent report to the developer!
Displays some statistics and expiring reminders from Omni Notes
WARNING: This will replace all current data!
This category is used by some notes.\nConfirm notes un-categorization and category deletion?
Support the development of this app with a non-profit donation
Exported file will overwrite existing one. Proceed?
Feature unavailable on this device, sorry
File to be imported doesn\'t exist
Importing data could overwrite current notes. Proceed?
LeakCanary was unable to save the analysis result.
Are you sure you want to delete all leaks?
Please grant external storage permission, otherwise memory leaks will not be detected.
Click to enable storage permission for %s.
Dumping memory, app will freeze. Brrrr.
Your app has not been granted the READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission.
A new version of Omni Notes is available, would you like to update?
No application found for this action
No categories have been created yet
No tags available yet\nCreate them by writing hashtags into your notes
Password removed: all notes have been unlocked
Permission to use microphone is needed to record audio notes
Permission to access to location is needed to add position informations to your notes
Permission to write on external storage is needed to allow backups on public folders
Permission to read on external storage is needed to allow attaching files from there
on the same day each month
Erase all of the app\'s data? (backups will be preserved)
Automatically adds location to new notes
Subscribe to the beta program to keep up to date with the latest features
What to do when an item is checked?
Unused menu items are automatically hidden
Make typed URLs and e-mail addresses automatically clickable
Swipe on notes to perform actions
Enables full color in list view. In detail view only the tag marker will be colored
Fully colored notes in list view and detail view
No crash reports will be sent. Do not complain if something goes wrong!
When app crashes developer will be informed to help you
Select your Springpad exported archive and be sure to be connected to internet
Pressing \"back\" when in notes list opens navigation menu instead of exiting
Allow the app to access notifications to make they survive to reboots
Password ensures that notes won\'t be viewed or modified by other persons.\n\nWhen setting a new password, the previous one will be requested.
Insert a question and a secret answer in case you forget the password
Dates are shown in a more detailed format
Dates are shown in a simplier format
Help the developer by sending non-sensitive data like device model, language, frequently used app\'s features. This data are used only to improve the open-source app.
Shows the number of associated notes next to the category
Adds a new item in navigation menu for not categorized notes
Use the (simpler) Android interface for date/time selection, instead of Google interface
Swiping notes with finger will archive them
Swiping notes with finger will trash them
Register the application to synchronize data on Google Drive storage service
Show me the application tour again
Subscribe to the communities to participate!
Share, tag, archive, protect, and more…
Add attachment of several kinds to your notes!
URL, e-mail addresses and telephone numbers recognition
Long pression have different effects on an object (attachment, location, reminder) than short pression!
To go back, press the \"up\" navigation icon, or your device button
Create new notes without \n leaving the one you\'re editing
Create new notes, sort them, access to preferences
Thanks for using Omni Notes \nThe opensource alternative for productivity and leisure note-taking!
Navigation menu allows you to move through notes with filters and categories
Add colored categories to organize notes at-a-glance
You launched Omni Note for the first time, would you like to take the application tour?
